task.title: Cut Record
task.shortdesc: Copy all visible Record Data information to the clipboard and delete current record.

step.cmd: Dispaly the record you wish to cut and choose the Session Cut record menu item (Shift+CMD+X).
step.stepresult: All visible tiers will be copied to the clipboard, and then the record will be deleted. It can be pasted into the Session Editor as a new record, or into another window.When pasted into a word processor, you will likely be able to automatically convert the copied record into a table. Ensure that you use tabs to separate cells.
